Name: Kuala Lumpur
Description: The capital city of Malaysia, known for its modern skyline, shopping districts, and cultural landmarks.

Name: Penang
Description: An island state in Malaysia, known for its rich history, colonial architecture, and vibrant street food culture.

Name: Selangor
Description: A central state surrounding Kuala Lumpur, known for its urban developments, industrial areas, and recreational parks.

Name: Johor
Description: A southern state in Malaysia, known for its large ports, beaches, and the popular tourist destination of Desaru.

Name: Sabah
Description: A state on the island of Borneo, known for its natural beauty, including Mount Kinabalu and diverse wildlife.

Name: Sarawak
Description: A large state on the island of Borneo, known for its rainforests, rivers, and indigenous cultures.

Name: Perak
Description: A state in the northern part of Peninsular Malaysia, known for its mining history, limestone hills, and heritage sites.

Name: Melaka
Description: A historical state in Malaysia, known for its Portuguese and Dutch colonial architecture, and UNESCO-listed heritage sites.
